title: Gloomverse
description: In a world filled with magic, she’s one of the few who doesn’t seem to have a knack for it. In what could be a lucky twist of fate, she ends up as the Assistant to the most famous magician in the world, Wallis Gloom! Unfortunately, he’s not exactly as he seems off-stage. Will Assistant prove she’s good enough for the job, or will his antics drive her off first?The first volume of the collected webcomic, Gloomverse.
author: Crayon Queen
